about_the_game:
Did you ever want to have your own planet or an asteroid? Protect your planet will give you this opportunity, but you will have to protect your planet from an asteroids storm. Destroy huge asteroids by clicking on them to save the life of your planet!

Use boosters to more effectively destroy asteroids and save the lives of your planet!

Featuring:

- Beautiful, full resolution graphics and design
- Control over time management by the boosters!
- Frequent feature updates, including new boosters!
- Infinite Gameplay: Even when you think it ends, there's more!

Planned features:


-Full featured Leaderboard system

Start defending your first planet!
Thanks for playing Protect your planet!

Did you ever want to have your own planet or an asteroid? Protect your planet will give you this opportunity, but you will have to protect your planet from an asteroids storm. Destroy huge asteroids by clicking on them to save the life of your planet!

Use boosters to more effectively destroy asteroids and save the lives of your planet!

Featuring:

- Control over time management by the boosters!
- Frequent feature updates, including new boosters!
- Infinite Gameplay: Even when you think it ends, there's more!

Start defending your first planet!

name: Protect your planet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 68 MB available space
